message: Hello Bob, I'm offering you a great product for a price of $10,000. I believe this product would be very beneficial for you.
I'm interested in the product, but $10,000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $7,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $10,000 is my initial asking price, I'm willing to come down to $9,000. This product truly delivers value and I believe that's a fair price.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $9,000 is still a bit high for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $6,800. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
